OVERSEAS_ENGINEERING AND EQUIPMENT_MANUFACTURING
Attending the 27th National Electrostatic Academic Annual Conference of the Chinese Physical Society
item.description: 2025年9月19日，中国物理学会第二十七届全国静电学术年会在南京召开。LEMS课题组刘晟洋同学参加此次会议并做口头报告。本次年会由中国物理学会静电专业委员会主办，联合多家权威机构共同承办，是国内静电领域的重要学术活动。会议为从事相关研究的专家学者提供了交流平台，旨在探讨静电学科的研究进展、技术应用与未来发展方向。

item.title: Chinese Ambassador to Morocco Li Changlin attended the unveiling ceremony of the China-Morocco Joint Laboratory for Green Energy and Advanced Materials
item.description: 2025年2月14日，驻摩洛哥大使李昌林赴摩洛哥乔伊杜卡利大学出席“中摩绿色能源与先进材料联合实验室”揭牌仪式，并参观新落成的中摩光储实验舱。杜卡利大学校长阿齐姆教授、埃尔加迪达省政府秘书长赛迪克先生、西安理工大学教授联合实验室负责人张嘉伟、华电科工股份有限公司副总经理吴沛骏及在摩企业代表等出席本次活动。

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Contact Huadian Heavy Industries Co., Ltd.

We are delighted that you are interested in Huadian Heavy Industries Co., Ltd., a leading company in power equipment, electrical materials, and smart energy solutions. Our mission is to deliver innovative technologies and high-quality products to support the global energy and power industry.

How to Reach Us

We welcome inquiries from prospective clients, partners, and researchers worldwide. Our team is ready to provide information, answer questions, and explore collaboration opportunities.

item.title: LEMS Laboratory Introduction
item.description:
LEMS – Intelligent International Innovation for Grid & Electrical Materials & Smart eXchange

Laboratory Overview

LEMS is a cutting-edge research laboratory dedicated to advancing high-voltage power systems, electrical materials, and smart energy technologies.

Mission

Our mission is to:

  • Foster innovation
  • Promote international collaboration
  • Drive technological breakthroughs in the fields of electrical engineering and smart grids

Research Focus

At LEMS, we focus on interdisciplinary research that bridges:

  • Material science
  • Power systems
  • Digital intelligence

Our goal is to develop novel solutions for:
